message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your product, but I think we can reach a better agreement. I am willing to pay $150 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I value this product at a higher price point. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable to agree on a price of $160.
